title: Perfect choice for a great quality and value stay in NY - Review
text:
I'm delighted I opted to stay at the Benjamin. Hotels in NY can be touch and go, even the ones that purport to be 4*, this was everything it said it would be and more.
There were a couple of little glitches, which can happen anywhere, but the way they were resolved were just off the scale in good customer service and showed the staff and management are genuine and care very much about their customers.
